settings.title: Become the 1% of successful freelancers
settings.html: Learn expert techniques to gain clients fast and earn what you are really worth!

settings.author: Alessandro (Alex) â€“ Instructor & Founder
settings.content:
I always wanted a coach to tell what and how I needed to do to grow my passions & earn lots of money, but I never got lucky.

I started my journey with $0 farm working under the sun of Australia, earning cents, not dollars. Now, after 5 years I earn between $20,000 and $40,000 per month and have a small remote team.

I built this course to help you save 5 years, thousand of dollars and avoid the all the hard work.

settings.text: Built your journey to 10K+ per month
Fast & pain-free with my proven method

settings.content: Disclamair! I earn money by freelancing and with my agency and not selling you a course! This make this content even more valuable and unique for you!

settings.title: And more...
settings.content: We're covering any freelance online job that involves finding clients, and closing deals

settings.title: Who is this course for
1. Successful mindset: what 99% of freelancers don't know.
settings.content: Don't let what you don't know stop you. Let's overcam the biggest mind-blockers freelancers have!

settings.title: 2. The ONLY X skills you need to build a profitable freelance business.
settings.content: Freelancing is no joke. But if you master these 3 simple skills everything else will become easier!

settings.title: 3. How to compete in the market with big players.
settings.content: It's normal to be afraid of competition. Together, we'll analise the pros and cons about working with big players and build your unique, strong offer around it!

settings.title: 4. How clients think & what they are looking for (craft powerful messages).
settings.content: Business owners or directors have a very busy life. Analyse how your and your offer appears on their mind and what you need to mention to get a positive reply.

settings.title: 5. How to price yourself correctly in the market to allow growth & profit.
settings.content: This is a critical lesson and you will understand how to price yourself once and never have to come back agai (if not by increasing your rates!).

settings.title: 6. Identify your client types & where to find them.
settings.content: Clients are all around you. Discover the type of clients you can work with and group them into different lists in order to craft a effective reach out startegies & personalised messages.

settings.title: 7. Reach out techniques & templates to get high response rate.
settings.content: By this point you will have a solid understanding of your ideal clients plus a list of jogs/contacts to contact. Utilise these templates and message structure to get higher response rate.

settings.title: 8. Must-have tools & apps to speed up your success.
settings.content: I will provide you with tools and apps to help you speed up your growth. But remember, this is optional and not required for completing this course succesfully.

settings.title: 9. How to communicate with clients correctly (most freelancer fail to do this)
settings.content: If the client communication is getting slower or you get a reply to 50% of your questions, it means the client is dying. Learn how to keep the communication efficient and boost retention rate!

settings.title: 10. Get tons of reviews from clients! (The secret I wish I new from the beginning)
settings.content: I literally wish i new this from the beginning, I would have collected 200% more reviews. They are CRITICAL to build trust and increase the speed of your success!

settings.title: 11. Pricing tips: how to get paid in advance (3, 6 month â€“ crazy!)
settings.content: Pricing strategy work (think about McDonald's). Position your offer in a way that clients will opt-in to pay 1, 2, 3 and even 6 months upfront! it is possible!

settings.title: 12. Scale your business: how to find and identify talented collaborators.
settings.content: Pair text with an image to focus on your chosen product, collection, or blog post. Add details on availability, style, or even provide a review.

settings.title: Course content
settings.content: 12 lectures - 08h total length

settings.html: This is just a pricing card placeholder

settings.title: How is this course different from others?
settings.content:
There are 1,000+ courses out there, how can Freelance Express be different?

We always felt that every course we bought out there was very generic and had a lot of fluff (e.g. "How to create an Upwork profile" ðŸ˜“). The important things, the secrets and the latest tips to get something was always missing. As a result, the hard part always needed to be figure out by you.

We took a different approach. We are Agency owners and have grown our business starting from 0, as freelancers. We learn a lot and failed a lot. We spent thousand of dollars in tools, group coaching, one-on-one coaching etc. In this course, we squised THE KEY tactics you need to succed and you will not find any of these informations in other courses or Youtube (if you do, we'll refund all the money and give you $100 on top).

settings.title: Can I have a refund if I don't like the course content?
settings.content: You are backed by 30-day money back guarantee. If you don't like the course, contact us via the live chat and we will process a refund immediately. No quesitons asked.

settings.title: Do you include any downloadable templates?
settings.content: You got it! Sure, we included email and social media messages templates that you can use, as well as linking to our internal documents, proposal templates etc.

settings.title: Do you offer coaching sessions?
settings.content: Althrough we love to help students, we have an active and busy life at our Multimerce agency and can't offer one-on-one coaching. We implemented a live chat to allow you contacting us anytime you need during the course, simply click the live chat icon and send us a message.

settings.title: What's the marekt value of this course?
settings.content:
"I wish someone had done a similar course when I was learning how to grow my freelance business" â€“ Alex.

Althrough is difficult to price knowledge, we calculated this course will save you a minimum of years of learnings & trials, approximately $1,500 in specialised courses and $1,000 savings in paid course content (Udemy) that you could find free on Youtube.

settings.title: Who built this course?
settings.content: This course has been designed and built by Alessandro (Alex) Pilotto & Anna Pearce. They started their journey as freelancers back in 2018 via Upwork and by working directly with agencies and clients. After 5 years, they combined their knowledge and expertise and founded Multimerce.co, a Digital Marketing agency based in Australia.

settings.title: What is Multimerce.co?
settings.content: Multimerce is a Digital marketing Agency founded in 2022 by Alex Pilotto & Anna Pearce after working as freelancers for 5 years. The agency specialises in Email Marketing and Loyalty Programs, helping businesses grow their revenue without spending more on advertising.
